text: @SenSchumer He doesn't want to talk about covid, its plain to see he failed, he wants to switch the narrative to something his base loves, to trigger a response. 'The crazy dems and all the do nothing dems want to do is their impeachment hoax. Its all their fault coronavirus. ' DISTRACTION!
